list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: speak in order to give information or express ideas or feelings; converse or communicate by spoken words.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they won't talk to the regime that killed their families

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có một sự ru ngủ nhỏ nhưng đáng chú ý trong cuộc nói chuyện
